    • countS3ObjectsInBucket

    • getS3ObjectsStreamFilteredInBucket

      Stream<software.amazon.awssdk.services.s3.model.S3Object> getS3ObjectsStreamFilteredInBucket(software.amazon.awssdk.services.s3.S3Client s3Client, String bucket, String prefix, Instant start, Instant end) throws DriverException, DriverNotFoundException
      Gets S3 objects that reside in a specific bucket and whose keys conform to the specified prefix using v2 of the AWS Java SDK.

      The objects returned will have a last-modified date between start and end.

      Any objects that have been modified outside of the specified date-time range will not be returned.
      Parameters:
      s3Client - The v2 AWS S3 client used to make the request to S3.
      bucket - The bucket where the S3 objects are located.
      prefix - The common prefix that the keys of the S3 objects must conform to.
      start - The objects returned will have been modified after this instant.
      end - The objects returned will have been modified before this instant.
      Returns:
      A Stream of S3Object objects.
      Throws:
      DriverException
      DriverNotFoundException

    • getS3ObjectsIteratorFilteredInBucket

      Iterator<software.amazon.awssdk.services.s3.model.S3Object> getS3ObjectsIteratorFilteredInBucket(software.amazon.awssdk.services.s3.S3Client s3Client, String bucket, String prefix, Instant start, Instant end) throws DriverException, DriverNotFoundException
      Gets S3 objects that reside in a specific bucket and whose keys conform to the specified prefix using v2 of the AWS Java SDK.

      The objects returned will have a last-modified date between start and end.

      Any objects that have been modified outside the specified date-time range will not be returned.
      Parameters:
      s3Client - The v2 AWS S3 client used to make the request to S3.
      bucket - The bucket where the S3 objects are located.
      prefix - The common prefix that the keys of the S3 objects must conform to.
      start - The objects returned will have been modified after this instant.
      end - The objects returned will have been modified before this instant.
      Returns:
      A Stream of S3Object objects.
      Throws:
      DriverException
      DriverNotFoundException
